# NETWORK::NETWORK_TRIGGER_DAMAGE_EVENT_FOR_ZERO_WEAPON_HASH

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** shouldTrigger

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
When set, damage events will trigger even if they have damage weapon hash as 0
